summary: Comprehensive testing of Goya Revision App completed. Fixed critical backend bugs and validated all core functionality. App is working excellently with GPT-5.2 integration, authentication, and CRUD operations.

fixed_bugs.issue: UserMessage constructor called with wrong parameter name 'image_contents' instead of 'file_contents'
FastAPI Header dependency not properly imported and used
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Added Header import and fixed all auth endpoint signatures

ui_bugs.issue: Login with existing credentials shows form validation error

passed_tests: Landing page loads with welcome popup (session-based)
All 5 revision types API endpoint working
Content generation with GPT-5.2 and image support
Subject and revision type selection (all working)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Login form validation issue where existing user login shows 'Please fill out this field' error despite filled fields. All core functionality working perfectly.
